template.name: autoescape
template.description: Whether automatic escaping is enabled or not, you can mark a section of a template to be escaped or not by using the autoescape tag

template.name: block
template.description: When a template uses inheritance and if you want to print a block multiple times, use the block function

template.name: parent
template.description: When a template uses inheritance, it's possible to render the contents of the parent block when overriding a block by using the parent function

template.name: use
template.description: Horizontal reuse is a way to achieve the same goal as multiple inheritance, but without the associated complexity

template.name: extends
template.description: The extends tag can be used to extend a template from another one.

template.name: do
template.description: The do tag works exactly like the regular variable expression ({{ ... }}) just that it doesn't print anything

template.name: embed
template.description: The embed tag combines the behaviour of include and extends

template.name: filter
template.description: Filter sections allow you to apply regular Twig filters on a block of template data. Just wrap the code in the special filter section

template.name: flush
template.description: The flush tag tells Twig to flush the output buffer

template.name: for
template.description: Loop over each item in a sequence

template.name: macro
template.description: Macros are comparable with functions in regular programming languages

template.name: if
template.description: The if statement in Twig is comparable with the if statements of PHP

template.name: ifelse
template.description: The if statement in Twig is comparable with the if statements of PHP

template.name: import
template.description: Twig supports putting often used code into macros. These macros can go into different templates and get imported from there

template.name: include
template.description: The include statement includes a template and returns the rendered content of that file into the current namespace

template.name: sandbox
template.description: The sandbox tag can be used to enable the sandboxing mode for an included template, when sandboxing is not enabled globally for the Twig environment

template.name: set
template.description: Assign value to variable

template.name: spaceless
template.description: Use the spaceless tag to remove whitespace between HTML tags, not whitespace within HTML tags or whitespace in plain text

template.name: verbatim
template.description: The verbatim tag marks sections as being raw text that should not be parsed.

template.name: abs
template.description: The abs filter returns the absolute value

template.name: capitalize
template.description: The capitalize filter capitalizes a value. The first character will be uppercase, all others lowercase

template.name: convert_encoding
template.description: The convert_encoding filter converts a string from one encoding to another. The first argument is the expected output charset and the second one is the input charset

template.name: date
template.description: The date filter formats a date to a given format

template.name: date_modify
template.description: The date_modify filter modifies a date with a given modifier string

template.name: default
template.description: The default filter returns the passed default value if the value is undefined or empty, otherwise the value of the variable

template.name: escape
template.description: The escape filter escapes a string for safe insertion into the final output. It supports different escaping strategies depending on the template context

template.name: first
template.description: The first filter returns the first "element" of a sequence, a mapping, or a string

template.name: format
template.description: The format filter formats a given string by replacing the placeholders (placeholders follows the sprintf notation)

template.name: join
template.description: The join filter returns a string which is the concatenation of the items of a sequence

template.name: json_encode
template.description: The json_encode filter returns the JSON representation of a value

template.name: last
template.description: The last filter returns the last "element" of a sequence, a mapping, or a string

template.name: lower
template.description: The lower filter converts a value to lowercase

template.name: nl2br
template.description: The nl2br filter inserts HTML line breaks before all newlines in a string

template.name: raw
template.description: The raw filter marks the value as being "safe", which means that in an environment with automatic escaping enabled this variable will not be escaped if raw is the last filter applied to it

template.name: replace
template.description: The replace filter formats a given string by replacing the placeholders (placeholders are free-form)

template.name: reverse
template.description: The reverse filter reverses a sequence, a mapping, or a string

template.name: round
template.description: The round filter rounds a number to a given precision

template.name: striptags
template.description: The striptags filter strips SGML/XML tags and replace adjacent whitespace by one space

template.name: title
template.description: The title filter returns a titlecased version of the value. Words will start with uppercase letters, all remaining characters are lowercase

template.name: trim
template.description: The trim filter strips whitespace (or other characters) from the beginning and end of a string

template.name: upper
template.description: The upper filter converts a value to uppercase

template.name: url_encode
template.description: The url_encode filter percent encodes a given string as URL segment or an array as query string
